title: Apparition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Absorb a dead player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will gain 2 charges of the non-killing abilities of the dead player.
- You can use up to 2 abilities per day/night cycle.
- Players targeted by your abilities are notified that an Apparition visited them.
- You cannot absorb abilities that kill. You do not gain Defense from absorbing abilities.
- You *can* absorb Town Power abilities.
- If you absorb a Mayor and reveal, the extra votes will disappear the next day.
- You can target dead players any number of times, but you cannot absorb and use a stolen ability in the same night.
